projects.name: Intelligent Campus Surveillance System Project
projects.description: Enhancing Campus Safety and Security, Real-time Monitoring, Accurate Object Detection, Reduce Manual Surveillance, Integration with Deepstream, Dashboard and Reporting, Deepstream, rabbitmq (queuing the frames), mysql database to dump, yolov8 model, Mern application with all false detections with images. projects.name: College Management System
projects.description: A college management is a project that manages the college'scanteen system, Library and store. Student can choose from the menu and then select the desired dish and book it with a token. The tech stack is HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, Node JS and Python. It helps in decreasing the food wastage and also helps the student get food in time so that he/she wont miss their classes.

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: Manages, stores and helps to keep track of books. It is a web application. The tech stack includes MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Python. The system keeps track of information such as issue date, last date to return the book and even fine information and thus there is no need to keep manual track of this information which thereby avoids chances of mistakes.
